data: At Toksugum Palace in Chongno of Seoul Sang Huin (known by his friends in the states as Shawn) felt an empathy as deep as the gods; and the reconstructed walls of ancient buildings that he could see into and imagine long deceased emperors in coronation ceremonies or reading their mandates became irrelevant.
Tokyo to Tijuana: Gabriele Departing America
browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: novels|category: american literature
